channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hello, world! Finally, I’ve decided to do Something with this darned github.io instance. I’m using Hugo, since I honestly don’t need anything other than markdown and static site stuff anyway. Hopefully this’ll become a useful resource for myself and others as time goes on. I need a place to document cool stuff I do, and how I approach certain problems I never find the answer to online :^) Thank!
